labels.unregister_dialog_content: You will be unregistered from the task and will not receive payment. The task becomes possible for others to register. Once you confirm, you can no longer undo it.

labels.payment_tooltip: Citizens are paid per diems. Municipal employees who have a role in accordance with the election agreement are remunerated with a fee.
labels.task_distribution_description: Invite participants to register for this task by clicking the “Copy link to task” button. This will give you a link in the clipboard that you can share. Using the link, the recipent can register for this particular task.

alert.content: The task may not exist or all slots have been taken

task_invitation.header: You have been assigned a task

alert.content: Remember to accept or reject the task on this page

confirmation.content: To accept, you must log in with MitID when you press Accept and register

error.reject_task: An error occurred when processing task rejection

alert.content: The task will be assigned to another participant

task_rejection_confirmation.content_2: or your party secretary, if you are member of a political party.

task_acceptance_cpr_invalid.content_3: You can also look at tasks where it might be possible to register for another task at the election.

task_acceptance_validation_failure.municipality_rule: You cannot register for this task, because you are not living in the required municipality
task_acceptance_validation_failure.citizenship_rule: You cannot register for this task, because you are not a citizen of the required country

labels.team_invitation_header: You have been invited to the team
labels.team_invitation_description: A team responsible has invited you to join this team. By joining, you can help run the upcoming election. Once you have created a user, you will have access to view and register for the team's available tasks.
labels.team_invitation_confirmation: Do you want to help with the election?
labels.team_invitation_confirmation_description: To become a member of the team, you must log in with your MitID when you press the button.
labels.name: Name
labels.link_description:
Invite members to your team by pressing the "Copy link to team" button. This will give you a link in the clipboard that you can share.

Using the link, the recipient can create a user and will automatically be added to the team. A team member can view and sign up for all open tasks that are not trusted.
labels.remove_member_confirmation: will no longer be part of the team and all assigned tasks will be removed.
labels.cannot_be_removed_tooltip: It is not possible to remove this member, because we need their information for their payment for a previous task.
